messages.subject: Q1 2024 Performance Review Schedule
messages.body: Please schedule your Q1 performance review with your manager by end of next week. The review window is March 25-April 5.

messages.subject: Urgent: Server Maintenance Tonight
messages.body: Emergency maintenance window scheduled for tonight 11 PM-2 AM EST to address critical security patches. Expect system downtime.

messages.subject: New Client Onboarding - Acme Corp
messages.body: Welcome aboard Acme Corp! Kickoff meeting scheduled for tomorrow at 2 PM EST. Please review attached documentation.

messages.subject: Office Supply Order Confirmation
messages.body: Your office supply order (ID: 45789) has been processed and will arrive by Thursday, March 21.

messages.subject: Updated Health Benefits Package
messages.body: Important changes to our health benefits package effective April 1st. Please review the attached documentation.

messages.subject: Team Building Event Next Month
messages.body: Save the date: Annual team building retreat scheduled for April 15-16 at Mountain View Resort.

messages.subject: Project Phoenix - Sprint Review
messages.body: Sprint review meeting tomorrow at 10 AM EST. Please prepare your updates for the stakeholder demo.

messages.subject: Parking Garage Maintenance
messages.body: Level 2 of the parking garage will be closed for maintenance on Friday. Please use levels 3-5.

messages.subject: Quarterly Security Training Due
messages.body: Reminder: Complete your mandatory security training by March 31st. Access the course via the learning portal.

messages.subject: New Feature Release - Beta Testing
messages.body: Looking for volunteers to beta test our new analytics dashboard. Testing period: March 25-29.

messages.subject: 401k Plan Changes
messages.body: Important updates to our 401k investment options. Virtual info session scheduled for next Tuesday at 1 PM EST.

messages.subject: Client Demo Preparation
messages.body: Pre-meeting sync for tomorrow's Acme Corp demo. Let's review the presentation at 4 PM today.

messages.subject: Office Snack Survey
messages.body: Help us stock the kitchen! Fill out the quick survey to vote on new snack options for the office.

messages.subject: Upcoming System Upgrade
messages.body: Major system upgrade planned for this weekend. Please save all work and log out by Friday 6 PM EST.

messages.subject: Monthly All-Hands Meeting
messages.body: March all-hands meeting scheduled for this Friday at 11 AM EST. Submit your questions for the Q&A by Thursday.
